backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two gallery UI adjustments and their related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files and components.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing prerequisites and steps for publishing the site to IC mainnet, including required gallery assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, fonts, favicon, and script mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app composing all site sections and conditionally rendering the Collections section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with scroll behavior, smooth navigation links, logo, mobile menu, and contact CTA.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutCa: Section displaying four capability cards with icons, headings, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Benefits section showing four icon-based cards and a heading/subheading describing designer advantages.
frontend/src/components/sections/Collect: Renders a collections grid with random or fixed thumbnails and metadata for each carpet category.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact cards, WhatsApp and directions buttons, and footer attribution for reaching the business.
frontend/src/components/sections/CustomC: Provides a custom carpets CTA with capability list, full-width hero image, and WhatsApp project link.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Shows a filterable image gallery with modal view, error handling, and precomputed asset URLs.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Landing hero with background image, headline, gallery scroll button, and WhatsApp project CTA.
frontend/src/components/sections/UsefulL: Displays external platform links with dynamic icons and responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Defines global contact details and helper for generating prefilled WhatsApp URLs.
frontend/src/config/usefulLinks.ts: Exports a list of external links used in the Useful Links section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes with custom typography and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Generates a safe, encoded URL for assets based on the project's base path.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, feature requests, and layout adjustments for spacing and section dividers.
